meta.description: Ginger Taylor, MS Executive Director, Canary Party Ginger Taylor is an author, speaker, activist and Executive Director of the Canary Party.Ginger earned a Masters degree in Clinical Counseling from Johns Hopkins University.

title: Ginger Taylor, MS
cleaned_text:
Ginger's son was diagnosed with autism shortly after his 18 month vaccinations. Since then, she has spent the majority of her time researching, speaking and writing about the topic. Ginger is the founder of Greater Brunswick Special Families, an organization that supports families dealing with developmental disabilities. She is also co-author of Vaccine Epidemic: How Corporate Greed Biased, Biased Science, and Coercive Government Threaten Our Human Rights, Our Health, and Our Children.

Ginger Taylor is an author, speaker, activist and Executive Director of the Canary Party.
